SRCCON 2018 is June 28 & 29 in Minneapolis Become a sponsor!

Become a SRCCON sponsor

Sponsors help make SRCCON happen. From scholarships that help bring a diverse group of attendees to SRCCON, to the unique coffee and tea hacking stations that create a social focal point during the conference, to meals and much more … sponsors make all of this work.

We’ll release a full slate of sponsorship opportunities before tickets go on sale, but if you want to get in early, we would love to talk with you. To find out more about sponsoring SRCCON, drop a line to Dan Sinker.

And to learn more about what makes SRCCON special, watch our video:

SRCCON 2016 highlights video, videography by Searle Video.

About SRCCON events

OpenNews runs several journalism events each year. The largest is this conference: SRCCON, a mid-year conference for about 300 developers, designers, and data analysts. We also gather small working groups and convenings, and in 2017 added our first topically focused SRCCON-style event, SRCCON:WORK in Philadelphia.
